experience.description:
Developed and designed web app (data visualization, training, dashboard) to significantly improve current project workflows
Implemented graph database (Neo4j), Python Flask (backend/API servers) and React-Redux (frontend) as critical constituents of the overall productivity improvement project

Contributed as part of pioneering “isomer” team to standardize aesthetics and experience across all Singapore Government websites
Designed layouts/templates for informational government websites
Led redesign and standardization of 'Singapore Government Design System' iconography
Supervised and conducted user testing involving 100 key users and training sessions for 200 super-users

Led a team of 20 individuals to conduct and present market research on technologies with a growing trend in start-up space
Conceived initiative to match students with start-ups for micro-projects to gain technical experience - successfully matched 12 students to 5 early-stage start-ups over 2 academic semesters NUS School of Computing (SoC)
